thread.title: Royals-Astros ALDS Game 3 will air exclusively on MLB Network
thread.title_full: Royals-Astros ALDS Game 3 will air exclusively on MLB Network

title: Royals-Astros ALDS Game 3 will air exclusively on MLB Network
text:
Royals-Astros ALDS Game 3 will air exclusively on MLB Network AP 
Oct 8, 2015 at 1:15p ET + Updated Oct 8, 2015 at 1:18p ET 
Major League Baseball announced this week that Game 3 of the American League Divisional Series between the Royals and the Houston Astros will broadcast exclusively on MLB Network at 3:10 p.m., Sunday, October 11. MLB Network's Matt Vasgersian, John Smoltz and Jon Paul Morosi will be on the call live from Minute Maid Park. 
MLB Network is widely available in the Royals home television territory via AT&T U-verse, CenturyLink, Charter Communications, Comcast, Cox, DIRECTV, DISH Network, Google Fiber, Time Warner Cable and other distributors. Since the 2014 World Series, MLB Network has added 20 new distributors nationwide, including Craw-Kan Telephone, Eagle Communications, H&B Communications and Rainbow Communications in the Royals home television territory. 
Fans may visit www.royals.com/postseason for a complete list of the distributors (including channel listings) that offer MLB Network in the Royals home television territory.
